name: Picross e5
synopsis: The 5th game in the Picross e series, with a Navigation Feature! Featuring Micross, Mega Picross and 20Ã—15 Picross, all three modes from the previous game. Also includes more than 150 satisfying, all-new puzzles to solve. Tutorials and rule options let newcomers to the series start playing with ease. Picross is a "Picture Crossword Puzzle Game" where numbers act as hints to complete images. The rules are simple and easy to grasp. Anyone can do it!
